# Videos Folder

## Instructions:
1. Add your home page promotional video here
2. Name the video file: `home.mp4`
3. Supported formats: MP4 (recommended), WebM

## Video Specifications:
- Recommended size: 1920x1080 (1080p) or 1280x720 (720p)
- File size: Keep under 10MB for fast loading
- Duration: 15-30 seconds recommended
- Format: MP4 with H.264 codec

## For Best Results:
- Use a fast-motion video showing your products or store
- Ensure good lighting
- Avoid videos with lots of text
- Compress the video before uploading

## Note:
The video will automatically play on the home page hero section in mute mode.
